sqlMap.select:
/* { jsTree - getChildNode } */ SELECT A.c_id , A.c_parentid , A.c_position , A.c_left , A.c_right , A.c_level , A.c_title , A.c_type ,
( SELECT case when COUNT(*) > 0 then 'InChild' else 'NoChild' end as YesNo FROM T_COMPREHENSIVETREE B WHERE B.C_PARENTID = A.C_ID ) AS childcount FROM T_COMPREHENSIVETREE A WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC

/* { jsTree - getChildNodeByLeftRight } */ SELECT C_ID, C_PARENTID, C_POSITION, C_LEFT, C_RIGHT, C_LEVEL, C_TITLE, C_TYPE FROM T_COMPREHENSIVETREE WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* { jsTree - searchNodeByString } */ SELECT c_left, c_right FROM T_COMPREHENSIVETREE WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* { jsTree - searchNodeByPosition } */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_COMPREHENSIVETREE WHERE 1=1
(C_LEFT < #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT > #[].c_right#)
sqlMap.update: /* { jsTree - alterNode } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_TYPE = #c_type# , C_TITLE = #c_title# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* { jsTree - getNode } */ SELECT C_ID, C_PARENTID, C_POSITION, C_LEFT, C_RIGHT, C_LEVEL, C_TITLE, C_TYPE FROM T_COMPREHENSIVETREE WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* { jsTree - getNodeByRef } */ SELECT C_ID, C_PARENTID, C_POSITION, C_LEFT, C_RIGHT, C_LEVEL, C_TITLE, C_TYPE FROM T_COMPREHENSIVETREE WHERE C_ID = #ref#
sqlMap.delete: /* { jsTree - removeNode } */ DELETE FROM T_COMPREHENSIVETREE WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* { jsTree - "removedAfterLeftFix" } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* { jsTree - "removedAfterRightFix" } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* { jsTree - "removedAfterPositionFix" } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
sqlMap.select: /* { jsTree - searchNodeByString } */ SELECT C_LEFT FROM T_COMPREHENSIVETREE WHERE C_PARENTID = 0
sqlMap.update: /* { jsTree - cutMyselfPositionFix } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
/* { jsTree - cutMyselfLeftFix } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#

/* { jsTree - cutMyselfRightFix } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* { jsTree - stretchPositionForMyselfFromJstree } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION + 1
C_PARENTID = #ref# AND C_POSITION >= #c_position#
AND C_ID NOT IN
(-1)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* { jsTree - stretchLeftForMyselfFromJstree } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* { jsTree - stretchRightForMyselfFromJstree } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* { jsTree - enterMyselfFixPosition } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_PARENTID = #ref#, C_POSITION = #c_position# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* { jsTree - enterMyselfFixLeftRight } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - (#idif#), C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - (#idif#), C_LEVEL = C_LEVEL - (#ldif#)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* { jsTree - alterNodeType } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_TYPE = #c_type# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* { jsTree - fixCopyIF } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_POSITION = #fixCopyPosition# WHERE C_ID = #fixCopyId#
/* { jsTree - fixCopy } */ UPDATE T_COMPREHENSIVETREE SET C_PARENTID = #fixCopyId# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
